title: Skin idea"little devil teemo "
body:
I mean explanation of how this idea came to be is pretty obvious 

Some ability effect ideas

"Q" has flame effects and creates a pentagram around the target

"W" leaves a trail of flames behind him

"E" covers the target  in a brief flame 
"R" a red mushroom with little horns with a pentagram around it 

any other ideas feel free to say

here is the creators link http://siranis.deviantart.com/art/Teemo-satan-478528913

replies.body: Looks like they liked the idea. just took some time ;D{{champion:17}}
They made it congrats man
Only took 2 years but FINALLY
plz make this a thing
The shroom should be just a pentagram drawn on the ground tho
Hi guys, Do you have any idea when it will be out in the store? (Australia)
It was released for Harrowing 2016 and like most of the other event skins is legacy. You'll see it back in store next Harrowing in one form or another in all likelihood.
YOU HAVE ACCEPTANCE. RITO TOOK IT IN.
And now it's here.
Nice
OMG EPIC...but the w trail will make him too easy to find like a singed with his q on
It would have the same mechanics as the normal trail
It would probably be something like ekko's passive with his ult as in you can't see it unless you can see him
Very cool
Recall animation, Teemo opens the pits of hell and pokes poor souls while laughing.

This would be awesome, good job with the drawing btw.
BUT Teemo is literally satin and if this ever becomes a skin this would or might make Teemo an regular champ.
And you all know we dont want that

Overall im backing this, looks amazing and great ideas for abilities.
I think the idea is good but the pentagram is a bit over the top.
Still waiting for Heart Seeker Taric
Wow this is really cool I hope riot see's this evil teemo morhahahahahahahah
Finally something that represents Teeto's true form.

I'm always wanted a Satanic Teemo skin.
They could pass one off as a Blood Moon skin.
Down voted because Teemo. Upvoted because of the little devil idea.
